name: Elite Sniper Shooting Training master 3d for free
name_original: Elite Sniper Shooting Training master 3d for free
description:
Army Training simulator is about army sniper shooter training in normal as well as war condition.

Soldier! you have to be trained and be best sniper shooting in the shooting range of our elite commando sharp shooter. Do you think that being getting best shooter in the academy is so easy? No! you have to concentrate . you have to shoot shoot and shoot until your hands become familiar with sharp shooting without missing the targets.

Army training simulator is to provide you realistic sniper shooting academy practice as it has been practice in the real military courses.
